name: Last days of recodery
description:
Last days of RecOdery is a game about communication and human relationships.

A small business is dedicated to repairing them through music vinyls that seeks to evoke the feelings that customers don't dare to express.

By placing the right pieces, everything that's being hidden is released, promoting healthy communication between people.

Diversifiers: 
The Roaring 20s
Hi, Rez!
Preaching to the Choir

Platforms: MS Windows

Tools and Technologies: Unity (any product)
